SMLTME.Calendar_Provider_Hint: The source of your world's calendar information.
SMLTME.Small_Step_Hint: Number of minutes to adjust the time with the < and > buttons. Hold Shift to double, Alt to halve.
SMLTME.Large_Step_Hint: Number of minutes to adjust the time with the << and >> buttons. Hold Shift to double, Alt to halve.
SMLTME.Resting_Opacity_Hint: Opacity of the SmallTime window when you're not interacting with it.
SMLTME.Darkness_Default_Hint: Default setting for the Darkness Control setting in Scene Config. Only applies to new scenes.
SMLTME.Darkness_Control_Hint: Link this scene's Darkness Level to the current time in SmallTime.
SMLTME.Darkness_Config_Hint: Drag the suns & moons to set sunrise and sunset times. Their heights set the maximum & minimum Darkness levels.
SMLTME.Hide_From_Players_Hint: Hide the SmallTime window from all non-GM users.
SMLTME.Allow_Trusted_Hint: Users with the Trusted Player role will be able to change the current time.
SMLTME.Player_Visibility_Hint: Choose which parts of SmallTime are visible to players in this scene.
SMLTME.Player_Visibility_Default_Hint: Default visibility level for scenes. Only applies to new scenes.
SMLTME.Player_Vis_2: Sun/Moon position and time of day
SMLTME.Darkness_Reset: Shift-click to reset times to defaults
SMLTME.Position_Reset: Shift-click to reset the SmallTime window postion
SMLTME.Sun_Sync_Hint: Acquire sunrise & sunset times from Simple Calendar.
SMLTME.Threshold_Override_Tooltip: SmallTime is adjusting this based on the moon's phase
SMLTME.Moonlight_Adjust_Hint: Adjust the Global Illumination Threshold based on the current phase of the moon.
SMLTME.Moon_Tint_Hint: Scenes in which SmallTime is controlling the Darkness level will be tinted with the color of the first available moon as configured in Simple Calendar.
SMLTME.Phase_Impact_Hint: Scales the amount of brightness impact the moon phase has on the current Darkness level (requires a refresh).
SMLTME.Moon_Darkness_Hint: Automatically adapt the maximum Darkness level based on the current phase of the moon.
SMLTME.Toggle_Hotkey_Hint: Toggles the SmallTime window on or off.
